text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, arrā ni shitagai nasai, mata shito to anata gata no naka no ken'nō o motsu mono ni shitagae. Anata gata wa nanigoto ni tsuite mo iron ga areba, arrā to shūmatsu no hi o shinjiru nonara, kore o arrā to shito ni yudane nasai. Sore wa mottomo yoi, mottomo datōna ketteidearu
